query:
SELECT 
  'clientes' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  COUNT(cidade) as com_cidade,
  COUNT(uf) as com_uf,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN cidade IS NOT NULL AND uf IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as com_ambos
FROM clientes
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'concorrentes' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  COUNT(cidade) as com_cidade,
  COUNT(uf) as com_uf,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN cidade IS NOT NULL AND uf IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as com_ambos
FROM concorrentes
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'leads' as tabela,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  COUNT(cidade) as com_cidade,
  COUNT(uf) as com_uf,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN cidade IS NOT NULL AND uf IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) as com_ambos
FROM leads;
